statements: UPDATE bioengineered_food_products SET price = 10.99 WHERE product_id = '4eb0650f-7417-4b92-83b5-0cefa1b03191';
UPDATE bioengineered_food_products SET popularity_score = 4.8, product_name = 'Super Veggie Mix' WHERE category = 'Vegetables';
UPDATE bioengineered_food_products SET price = 12.99, category = 'Organic' WHERE product_id = 'c5defa5d-5933-4be5-83a3-64ec912756d6';
UPDATE bioengineered_food_products SET product_name = 'Super Greens Mix', popularity_score = 4.5 WHERE product_id = '2520423e-166c-4cbf-9d57-db35bc466977';
UPDATE bioengineered_foods SET price = 15.99, description = 'Fresh and healthy' WHERE food_id = 1;
UPDATE market_analysis SET demand = 100, preference = 'High' WHERE analysis_id = 2;
UPDATE bioengineered_foods SET price = 15.99, description = 'Organic and Non-GMO' WHERE food_id = 1;
UPDATE market_analysis SET demand = 1000, preference = 'High' WHERE food_id = 3;
UPDATE bioengineered_products SET price = 49.99, production_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET rating = 4, feedback = 'Great product, highly recommended' WHERE customer_id = 201 AND product_id = 101;
UPDATE bioengineered_products SET price = 120.55, production_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE customer_preferences SET rating = 4, feedback = 'Product is great!' WHERE product_id = 201
UPDATE FoodProducts SET price = 15.99, expiration_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE MarketTrends SET demand_rating = 5, trend_date = '2022-08-20' WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE FoodProducts SET price = 25.99, category = 'Dairy' WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE MarketTrends SET popularity_rating = 5, trend_date = '2023-08-15' WHERE product_id = 201;
UPDATE Product SET price = 15.99, quantity = 50 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET rating = 4, feedback = 'Great product' WHERE id = 201;
UPDATE Product SET price = price * 1.1, quantity = quantity - 10 WHERE id = 100;
UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET rating = rating + 1, feedback = CONCAT('Updated: ', feedback) WHERE id = 50;
